content: Why is the unused_lifetimes lint set to allow-by-default?

fwiw, when I wrote the lint docs, I tried to document why every lint is "allow"...except that one. From PR #50440 and the tracking issue, I couldn't see a clear reason. My best guess is that it was a conservative choice, as it looks like it was maybe intended to experiment and see how it goes.
It also looks like there might be some false positives.
If you want to write a PR changing it to warn-by-default with a "stabilization report" of "here's what it does and why it's ok to have warn-by-default", I'd be happy to FCP that.
